info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 31 at 3:40PM EDT until July 31 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...
Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County.
For the Salamonie River...including Portland...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Salamonie River at Portland.
* WHEN...From this afternoon to late this evening.
* IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Lowland agricultural flooding.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 PM EDT Thursday was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
this evening at 1100 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE THIS EVENING
